author: Digital Foundry
description:
Digital Foundry is now fully independent! Join the DF Supporter Program and support the team: https://bit.ly/3jEGjvx

A brand new patch 1.30 lands on all current-gen consoles, with PS5 Pro in particular reaping the spoils with a new PSSR toggle, and also increased 60fps performance while using its ray tracing 'graphics' mode. The advantages speak for themselves, as Tom covers here, but there are a few limitations to consider also. 

Go here to check out DF merch! https://store.digitalfoundry.net

Subscribe for more Digital Foundry: http://bit.ly/DFSubscribe

00:00 Overview
01:55 TAA Upgrades Tested
03:25 PS5/Series X/Pro Unlocked Frame-Rate Test
06:48 PS5/Series X 40FPS Graphics Mode Test
10:00 PS5 Pro 60FPS Graphics Mode Test
11:19 PSSR Pros and Cons
15:50 Conclusion
title: Control - PS5/Pro/Series X Update 1.30 - PSSR Upscaling and RT at 60FPS Tested on PS5 Pro!
